@realDonaldTrump Why we're DYING:
"Kushner encouraged Trump to treat the emergency as a PR problem when Fauci and others were calling for aggressive action. Relatedly, Kushner oversold Google’s coronavirus testing website. Trump got slammed in the press for promoting the phantom Google product." https://t.co/HKffTtn2hu
